程序包 dao.mappers

类 Recipe

java.lang.Object
dao.mappers.Recipe
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Recipe extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Recipe entity with essential attributes. This class encapsulates details such as recipe ID, name, serving amount, preparation time, cooking time, and image URL.
作者:
He Chenyi
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Recipe

      public Recipe()
      Default constructor for the Recipe class.

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int recipeId, String recipeName, int serveAmount, int preparationTime, int cookingTime)
      Default constructor for the Recipe class with parameters.
      参数:
      recipeId - The unique identifier of the recipe.
      recipeName - The name of the ingredient.
      serveAmount - The quantity or amount of the serve of the recipe.
      preparationTime - The preparation time of the recipe cooking.
      cookingTime - ` The cooking time of the recipe cooking.

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int recipeId, String recipeName, int serveAmount, int cookingTime, int preparationTime, String imageUrl)
      Constructs a Recipe object with specified attributes.
      参数:
      recipeId - The unique identifier for the recipe.
      recipeName - The name or title of the recipe.
      serveAmount - The number of servings the recipe yields.
      cookingTime - The time required for cooking the recipe, in minutes.
      preparationTime - The time required for preparing the recipe, in minutes.
      imageUrl - The URL or path to the image associated with the recipe.
